startApplication.name: startApplication
startApplication.comment:
Hook to start up the application.

Attaches the lithium_ion/lithium_application.Application to the CanvasElement at the given lithium_ion/lithium_application.startApplication.canvasId. From there it pushes the lithium_ion/lithium_application.Screen and begins execution.

class.name: WindowResizedEvent
class.preview: An event for when an lithium_ion/lithium_application.ApplicationWindow is resized.

class.name: UpdateLoop
class.preview: Handles the update loop for an application.

class.name: Screen
class.preview: A single layer that has both update and draw logic.

class.name: GraphicsDeviceManager
class.preview: Defines the interface for an object that manages a lithium_ion/lithium_graphics.GraphicsDevice.

class.name: FrameEvent
class.preview: An event for when an animation frame is started.

class.name: ExitEvent
class.preview: An event for when an lithium_ion/lithium_application.Application is being closed.

class.name: DeactivationEvent
class.preview: An event for when an lithium_ion/lithium_application.Application loses focus.

class.name: ActivationEvent
class.preview: An event for when an lithium_ion/lithium_application.Application receives focus.
